OOC: Add this to my last posts

After that Shivah sent a messsage to his brothers and Preborn, he  
blocked the comm link in that way that Predacons just can get comm 
link with Shivah (and no one else) and Lunarpine couldn't send a 
comlink while he was out BlackFortress area.

"he's a single bot" replied Shivah"Bat probes reported just a single 
bot, not an army -he wants... scare us"

>

or
